dmca.title: Copyright violation on thegurukiller.com
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: carl@scamfreeproducts.com [mailto:carl@scamfreeproducts.com] 
Sent: Saturday, June 02, 2007 5:44 PM
To: Copyright
Cc: carl@scamfreeproducts.com
Subject: Copyright violation on thegurukiller.com

Carl Haynes / ScamFreeProducts.Com 
vs 
TheGuruKiller.Com / ThePlanet.Com

Copyright Violation & DMCA

Dear Andrea,

ThePlanet.Com is the service provider for the domain name thegurukiller.com
hosted on the IP Address 74.52.106.2.

This domain on its first page, http://www.thegurukiller.com is in copyright
violation of my content on
http://www.scamfreeproducts.com/plance. The infringing domain was registered
on 27th April 2007.

Whole paragraphs (verbatim) and images have been taken from the URL mentioned
above and placed within the content of the infringing site. By scrolling a
quater of the page down on the infringing site, you will see the wholesale
copying of entire headings,titles and paragraphs from
http://www.scamfreeproducts.com/plance. Further down, you will see the copying
of images.

This unauthorized copying constitutes copyright infringement under Section 106
of the U.S. Copyright Act . Depending upon the type of service The Planet is
providing to this IP address, it may have legal and/or equitable liability if
it does not expeditiously remove or disable access to the infringing site, or
if it fails to implement a policy that provides for termination of subscribers
who are repeat infringers (see, 17 U.S.C.
